definition: a galaxy of talent (idiom)/a great number of competent people
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Teacher, I wish you the education students, a galaxy of talents, the elite men.
sentences.chinese: 老师，祝您教育的学生，人才济济，精英辈出。

sentences.english: The Performance Team is a highly energetic one and is full of very talented people.
sentences.chinese: 性能团队的精力是非常充沛的，并且人才济济。

definition: to come forth in large numbers
lit. hidden dragon, crouching tiger (idiom)/fig. talented individuals in hiding/concealed talent
lit. strong soldiers and sturdy horses (idiom)/fig. a well-trained and powerful army
an up-and-coming youngster/new talent/a brilliant younger generation
young and promising
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
brimming over with talent (esp. literary)/brilliant
to have boundless prospects
to assume personal responsibility (idiom); to take charge of a section
variant of 人才[ren2 cai2]
strategic experts as thick as rain (idiom); no shortage of advisers on strategy
the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time
mainstay/cornerstone/tower of strength
expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
core/nucleus/backbone

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
